name: The Purple Asteroid
description:
Keyboard: Arrow Keys to move, hold space while hitting asteroid to split asteroid into 2 purple halves.

Gamepad: D-pad to move, A button to split asteroid in half

Block the asteroids with the Purple Asteroid.  You will get double points for each asteroid you destroy with these purple halves.  More points will give you more power-ups and alien technology from the Aliens.

You are The Purple Asteroid!  You have been tasked with saving the moon from the burning asteroid threat.  You'll get help along the way from alien technology.  Defeat the evil asteroid to win the game!

Art, Background Music - Me

Sound Effects: Vimana Vol. 1 from Splice
